scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:types && npm run build:rename
scripts.build:watch: npm run build:js -- --watch & npm run build:types -- --watch
scripts.build:rename: [ -f dist/index.js ] && mv dist/index.js dist/index.mjs || true; [ -f dist/index.d.ts ] && mv dist/index.d.ts dist/index.d.mts || true
scripts.confirm: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build:check-types && npm run test
